architecture:
graph TD;
    subgraph Frontend
        ReactApp[React Application]
    end
    subgraph Backend
        APIGateway[API Gateway]
        LambdaFunctions[AWS Lambda Functions]
        Cognito[User Authentication]
    end
    subgraph Database
        DynamoDB[(DynamoDB)]
    end
    subgraph ExternalServices
        GitHub[GitHub]
        CICD[CI/CD Pipeline]
        AWS[AWS Infrastructure]
    end
    ReactApp -->|HTTP Requests| APIGateway
    APIGateway -->|Invoke| LambdaFunctions
    LambdaFunctions -->|Read/Write| DynamoDB
    ReactApp -->|Authenticate| Cognito
    LambdaFunctions -->|Integrate| GitHub
    LambdaFunctions -->|Deploy| CICD
    LambdaFunctions -->|Manage| AWS
    Cognito -->|User Data| DynamoDB
sequence:
sequenceDiagram;
    participant User as User
    participant Frontend as React App
    participant API as API Gateway
    participant Lambda as AWS Lambda
    participant DB as DynamoDB
    participant Auth as Cognito

    User->>Frontend: Upload UML Diagrams
    Frontend->>API: Send UML Diagrams
    API->>Lambda: Process Diagrams
    Lambda->>DB: Store Artifacts
    Lambda-->>API: Code Generation
    API-->>Frontend: Generated Code
    User->>Frontend: Review Code
    Frontend->>API: Deploy Code
    API->>Lambda: Trigger Deployment
    Lambda->>Auth: Authenticate User
    Auth-->>Lambda: JWT Token
    Lambda->>DB: Update Deployment Status
    Lambda-->>API: Deployment Success
    API-->>Frontend: Deployment Confirmation
    Frontend-->>User: Deployment Complete
component:
graph TD;
    subgraph ReactApp
        Header[Header Component]
        Sidebar[Sidebar Component]
        MainView[Main View]
        CodeEditor[Code Editor]
        UMLUploader[UML Uploader]
        CodeViewer[Code Viewer]
        DeploymentManager[Deployment Manager]
    end
    Header -->|Navigation| Sidebar
    Sidebar -->|Routes| MainView
    MainView -->|Displays| CodeEditor
    MainView -->|Displays| UMLUploader
    MainView -->|Displays| CodeViewer
    MainView -->|Displays| DeploymentManager
    CodeEditor -->|State Management| MainView
    UMLUploader -->|Uploads| MainView
    CodeViewer -->|Displays| MainView
    DeploymentManager -->|Manages| MainView
database:
erDiagram;
    USER {
        string id PK
        string email
        string name
        string role
        datetime createdAt
        datetime updatedAt
    }
    UML_DIAGRAM {
        string id PK
        string userId FK
        string name
        text content
        datetime createdAt
        datetime updatedAt
    }
    GENERATED_CODE {
        string id PK
        string umlDiagramId FK
        string userId FK
        text code
        datetime createdAt
        datetime updatedAt
    }
    DEPLOYMENT {
        string id PK
        string generatedCodeId FK
        string userId FK
        string status
        datetime createdAt
        datetime updatedAt
    }
    USER ||--o{ UML_DIAGRAM : owns
    USER ||--o{ GENERATED_CODE : owns
    USER ||--o{ DEPLOYMENT : owns
    UML_DIAGRAM ||--o{ GENERATED_CODE : generates
    GENERATED_CODE ||--o{ DEPLOYMENT : deploys
